mapper.select: select DISTINCT mo.id from SYS_OPENID_CARNUMBER oc left join SYS_MOBILE_OPENID mo on oc.openid = mo.openid where oc.OPENID = #{openId} and oc.IS_DELETED = 0
mapper.update: update SYS_OPENID_CARNUMBER oc set oc.CARNUMBER = #{newCarNum}, oc.ENGINENUM = #{engineNum}, oc.IDENTNUM = #{identNum}, oc.EMISSIONSTD = #{emissionStd}, oc.FLEETNAME = #{fleetName}, oc.REGDATE = #{regDate}, oc.DEPARTMENT = #{department}, oc.GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified} where oc.OPENID = #{openId} and oc.CARNUMBER = #{oldCarNum} and oc.IS_DELETED = 0
mapper.select:
select oc.OPENID, oc.CARNUMBER,oc.IS_ENABLED from SYS_OPENID_CARNUMBER oc
and oc.OPENID = #{openId}
and oc.IS_DELETED = 0
order by oc.OPENID
select count(*) from FG_CARYB_FILE@SUPC where CAR_NO = #{carNum}
mapper.insert: insert into FG_CARYB_FILE@SUPC (ATTACHMENT, CAR_NO, SUPP_ID, SUPP_NAME, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, FILE_NAME) values ( #{drivingLicense}, #{carNum}, '', '', #{openId}, TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss'), 'wechat' )
mapper.select:
select a.ID as id, a.CARNUMBER as carNum, a.FROZEN_STATUS as frozenStatus, a.START_DATE as startDate, a.EXPIRE_DATE as expireDate, a.GMT_CREATE as gmtCreate, a.GMT_MODIFIED as gmtModified, a.VIOLATION_TIMES as violationTimes from SYS_CARNUM_FROZEN a
and a.FROZEN_STATUS = #{frozenStatus}
mapper.insert:
insert all
into SYS_CARNUM_FROZEN (ID,CARNUMBER,FROZEN_STATUS,START_DATE,EXPIRE_DATE,GMT_CREATE,GMT_MODIFIED,VIOLATION_TIMES) values (get_carnumfrozen_seq,#{carnumfrozen.carNum},#{carnumfrozen.frozenStatus},#{carnumfrozen.startDate}, #{carnumfrozen.expireDate},#{carnumfrozen.gmtCreate},#{carnumfrozen.gmtModified},#{carnumfrozen.violationTimes})
select 1 from dual
